compliant.section: 華碩會在取得您的同意後，才會蒐集您的以下個人資料
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing: Consent must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous.  A clear affirmative action signifying agreement to the processing of personal data is required.

compliant.section: 當您欲註冊ASUS會員時，您需要提供您真實、正確、最新且完整的註冊資料
compliant.legal provisions: Accuracy: Personal data shall be accurate and, where necessary, kept up to date; every reasonable step must be taken to ensure that personal data that are inaccurate, having regard to the purposes for which they are processed, are erased or rectified without delay.

non_compliant.section: 在某些國家，為了避免不當地蒐集及使用未成年人的個人資料，我們可能需請您額外提供您的年齡或您父母親（或監護人）的聯絡資料以取得其同意
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions applicable to child's consent in relation to information society services:  For children below the age of 16, parental consent is required for offering information society services directly to a child.  The controller shall make reasonable efforts to verify in such cases that consent is given or authorised by the holder of parental responsibility over the child.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the age of consent for children to provide personal data, taking into account the age defined by GDPR (16 years old) or the age defined by local law if lower.  Clearly outline the process for obtaining parental consent for users below this age, including how consent will be verified.

non_compliant.section: 當您使用華碩產品及服務時，您不一定要依照我們的要求提供個人資料，但如果您選擇不提供，會導致我們在許多情況下無法為您提供產品或服務，或是無法回應您提出的問題
non_compliant.legal provisions: The data subject should have the right to withdraw his or her consent at any time.  It should be as easy to withdraw as to give consent.  When the processing is based on consent or on a contract, and the processing is carried out by automated means, the data subject should have the right to data portability.
non_compliant.amend: Ensure that the request for personal data is not a precondition for providing the service, unless it is necessary for the performance of a contract or required by law.  If the processing is based on consent, provide alternative options for accessing the service without requiring consent.
